plot: Working as a pastry chef, Luke steals a watch from a customer, which results in a wild police chase throughout the store.
title: Luke, the Candy Cut-Up
plot_es: Working as a pastry chef, Luke steals a watch from a customer, which results in a wild police chase throughout the store.
plot_en: Working as a pastry chef, Luke steals a watch from a customer, which results in a wild police chase throughout the store.
